synopsis.text: Bu's cunning plan, the capital city of Luoyang is set ablaze, and the coalition forces must use all their wit and strategy to save the hostages and the future of the country. In this epic tale of heroism and betrayal, the famous figures of the time unite to protect their land and challenge the tyranny of Dong Zhuo. Will they succeed in their mission, or will the country fall into chaos? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
